abstract: Typological features of blag1240. creator: Marian Klamer

data_collection.Date: Also present: Ibu Novie Moybecka (interviewer, teacher of English in Kalabahi) and Waanisa Djainangga (speaker code WD, student of English and originally from the village next door to Dadibura).
